revised_title: Investigating the Properties and Composition of Wootz Steel from Bombay
tldr: This article investigates the nature of Wootz steel, a type of steel manufactured in Bombay, and its properties and composition. The author conducts experiments and observations to understand its unique characteristics, such as its hardness and inability to be welded with iron or steel. The study also compares the specific gravity of Wootz steel with other types of steel and iron.
